abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.74.0 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: snapshot_8108
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.74.0 release.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.74.0 release.

screen.phrase: Added template for procedure autonumbering. Closes bug #2020982.
Get rid of the rest of the hardcoded buildtools references and actually use DOCBOOK_SVN

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.74.0 release.

screen.phrase: Removed duplicate templates. Closes bug #2034582.

Upgraded to support the latest version of XSLTHL 2.0 -- nested markup in highlited code is now processed -- it is no longer needed to specify path XSLTHL configuration file using Java property -- support for new languages, including Perl, Python and Ruby was added
Clarified usage of table PIs (only bgcolor works for both CALS and HTML tables).
"lines" -> "line".
Fix bug in table.width where it wasn't using the tgroup context for computing column widths.
Removed "." from the nodes variable in the set.toc template.
Get rid of the rest of the hardcoded buildtools references and actually use DOCBOOK_SVN

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.74.0 release.

screen.phrase: Sorry about r8102: tbody, thead, and tfoot are OK in HTML tables.
Removed superfluous thead, tbody and tgroup in match attribute (leaving only tr).
Reverted the temporary r8075 change.
Removed duplicate templates. Closes bug #2034582.
Improved default color scheme for XML markup

Upgraded to support the latest version of XSLTHL 2.0 -- nested markup in highlited code is now processed -- it is no longer needed to specify path XSLTHL configuration file using Java property -- support for new languages, including Perl, Python and Ruby was added
More snapshot testing.
"lines" -> "line".
Clarified that the table PIs are for CALS tables.
